scalar:array.comment: /** * Swift Mailer Logging Layer base class. * Please read the LICENSE file * @author Chris Corbyn <chris@w3style.co.uk> * @package Swift_Log * @license GNU Lesser General Public License */
/** * The Logger class/interface. * @package Swift_Log * @author Chris Corbyn <chris@w3style.co.uk> */
/** * Failed recipients * @var array */
/** * The maximum number of log entries * @var int */
/** * The level of logging currently set. * @var int */
/** * Add a new entry to the log * @param string The information to log * @param string The type of entry (see the constants: COMMAND, RESPONSE, ERROR, NORMAL) */
/** * Dump the contents of the log to the browser. * @param boolean True if the string should be returned rather than output. */
/** * Add a failed recipient to the list * @param string The address of the recipient */
/** * Get the list of failed recipients * @return array */
/** * Set the maximum size of this log (zero is no limit) * @param int The maximum entries */
/** * Get the current maximum allowed log size * @return int */
/** * Set the log level to one of the constants provided. * @param int Level */
/** * Get the current log level. * @return int */
/** * Check if the log level includes the one given. * @param int Level * @return boolean */
/** * Swift Mailer Logging Layer base class. * Please read the LICENSE file * @author Chris Corbyn <chris@w3style.co.uk> * @package Swift_Log * @license GNU Lesser General Public License */
/** * The Logger class/interface. * @package Swift_Log * @author Chris Corbyn <chris@w3style.co.uk> */
